In an accident, Sing-yan acquires skills for communicating with Donut, and a man and a dog gradually build a friendship and help each other. Sing-yan learns from Donut that Wai-ting has some love issues, so he helps her decipher her conundrum. The duo's relationship improves, and they gradually like each other. Shira memberitahu Diana yang Azraf selama ni hanya berpura-pura minum susu yang diberi oleh Diana setiap malam. Hakikatnya Azraf tak suka minum susu dan buang susu tu di belakang Diana. Diana kecil hati dengan Azraf yang dirasakannya telah memalukan dia dan tidak menghargai kasih sayangnya selama ini. Azraf terpaksa memujuk Diana dan memberitahu yang dia terpaksa berbohong dengan ibu mertuanya tentang cerita susu itu. Bila Shira tahu yang Azraf berbohong, Shira mengamuk dan Raisya turut berkecil hati dengan Azraf. Shira dan Diana masih cuba merebut kasih sayang anak menantu sehingga merimaskan Azraf dan Raisya. Hari itu setelah Raisya bersungguh-sungguh membantu Diana memasak, Azraf dengan selamba memuji masakan Diana tanpa menyelitkan nama Raisya. Raisya terasa hati.

programme.title: Hipster Tour - Tasmania & What's On Today
programme.desc: In the latest episode of "What's Trendy?", Leung Chi-pui will explore Tasmania, a paradise in the hearts of many Australians. The journey begins in Hobart, the southern capital, and ends in Launceston in the north, showcasing the diverse landscapes of the city and nature. Tasmania's waters are rich in marine resources, and Chi-pui certainly won't miss out. Besides Tasmanian oysters, a favorite among Hong Kong locals, she also enjoys fresh sea urchins caught directly by divers, a truly delightful experience. The episode will also delve into Tasmania's natural beauty, including canoeing to admire the snow-capped mountains and getting up close to unique native animals. Chi-pui explores Tasmania from multiple perspectives, leading viewers on an unforgettable "trendy travel" journey.

programme.title: Defected, The
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

programme.title: News Treasury 2025
programme.desc: As the saying goes, "Today's news is tomorrow's history." With so much news every day, it's hard for everyone to take it all in, let alone look back at history. History is a treasure troveâ€”if we ignore or underestimate it, we might miss out on its riches. The new program "News Treasure Hunt" guides viewers to uncover news gems from this vault. In addition to special features, live broadcasts, and series reports from the past, the show offers never-before-seen precious footage. Audiences will have the chance to revisit events such as Bruce Lee's funeral, the Bank of Po Sang robbery, the Gang of Four trial, the Queen's visit to Hong Kong, taxi strikes, the signing of the Sino-British Joint Declaration, an exclusive interview with Margaret Thatcher, Vietnamese refugees, the death of Governor Youde, Chris Patten's arrival in Hong Kong, the closure of Kai Tak Airport, the passing of Deng Xiaoping, the 1997 Handover Ceremony, the China Airlines Hong Kong crash, and SARS press conferences.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: Defected, The
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

programme.title: Hipster Tour - Tasmania
programme.desc: In the latest episode of "What's Trendy?", Leung Chi-pui will explore Tasmania, a paradise in the hearts of many Australians. The journey begins in Hobart, the southern capital, and ends in Launceston in the north, showcasing the diverse landscapes of the city and nature. Tasmania's waters are rich in marine resources, and Chi-pui certainly won't miss out. Besides Tasmanian oysters, a favorite among Hong Kong locals, she also enjoys fresh sea urchins caught directly by divers, a truly delightful experience. The episode will also delve into Tasmania's natural beauty, including canoeing to admire the snow-capped mountains and getting up close to unique native animals. Chi-pui explores Tasmania from multiple perspectives, leading viewers on an unforgettable "trendy travel" journey.

Selama melarikan diri, mereka menghadapi berbagai rintangan dan berangsur-angsur membangun hubungan yang erat. Di tengah kekalutan, perasaan di antara mereka mulai berkembang, meskipun Amir masih mencintai Salina dan Aina memiliki hubungan dengan Wahid. Setelah mengharungi banyak dugaan, mereka berjaya keluar dari hutan. Wahid, yang telah menerima kenyataan kehilangan Aina, memutuskan untuk becuti di luar negara. Di saat yang sama, hubungan antara Salina dan Amir terus berkembang.

programme.title: Black S1 EP8

Memandangkan Leo juga akan hadir, Sofia meyakinkan Black untuk menghadiri majlis tari-menari itu bersamanya, dan ini mendorong Black untuk belajar menari. Tetapi ketika berada di majlis itu, dia ternampak Sofia dan Lokman menari bersama dan timbul rasa cemburu, satu emosi yang asing buat dirinya. Sementara itu, Aisya menerima panggilan misteri daripada telefon Black semasa perjalanannya ke lapangan terbang. Pemanggil misteri itu memberitahu Aisya bahawa nyawa Malik dalam bahaya melainkan dia hadir di majlis tari-menari bertopeng itu. Berjayakah Black menangkap 419 akhirnya atau adakah pembunuh upahan itu dapat menghalang Black dan mengucar-ngacirkan misinya? Kalau Black kehilangan tubuh Malik, dia juga akan kehilangan Sofia, wanita manusia yang telah menyentuh hatinya...

Many people may be wondering how to make the most of these festive holidays. In this program, host Elena Kong, together with celebrity guests, will introduce viewers to the best places in Hong Kong to eat, drink, and have fun during the festive season, offering attractive leisure guides to encourage everyone to stay and spend locally. programme.title: Defected, The
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

Unwilling to see ON shoulder the burden on his own, KWAN KA-LOK (Linda Chung), the third of the siblings, turns to her supervisor GAO WANG-CHIM (Michael Tse) for assistance, resulting in her taking part in an indecent proposal. Her boyfriend, TING KOON-FUNG (Ron Ng), breaks up angrily with her when he finds out about their affair. KWAN KA-WING (Him Law), the youngest of the four, prefers spending to saving and decides that he will in no circumstances help in the service of the mortgage. programme.title: Homeland Guardian
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development. He, KEUNG and HUI MAN BILL (Chan Kam Hung, Sunny) organized a development company and earned their first bucket of gold. When TIM was happy with his achievement, his enemy had broken his brother's legs. TIM suffered a great blow and decided to reform. On the other hand, BILL, stressed on principle, was surprised to find that his respected master in fact was corrupt.

Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. programme.title: Homeland Guardian & What's On Today
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: I've Got The Power
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power! Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character. However, he has offended crime boss Ho Hing-lung (Jimmy Au) because of his deeds. He has also troubled his close friends Or Tsui-ping (Tiffany Lau) and Ko Shau (Jazz Lam), and his uncle Yuen Ka-fu.

In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: News Treasury 2025
programme.desc: As the saying goes, "Today's news is tomorrow's history." With so much news every day, it's hard for everyone to take it all in, let alone look back at history. History is a treasure troveâ€”if we ignore or underestimate it, we might miss out on its riches. The new program "News Treasure Hunt" guides viewers to uncover news gems from this vault. In addition to special features, live broadcasts, and series reports from the past, the show offers never-before-seen precious footage. Audiences will have the chance to revisit events such as Bruce Lee's funeral, the Bank of Po Sang robbery, the Gang of Four trial, the Queen's visit to Hong Kong, taxi strikes, the signing of the Sino-British Joint Declaration, an exclusive interview with Margaret Thatcher, Vietnamese refugees, the death of Governor Youde, Chris Patten's arrival in Hong Kong, the closure of Kai Tak Airport, the passing of Deng Xiaoping, the 1997 Handover Ceremony, the China Airlines Hong Kong crash, and SARS press conferences.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a 'Fire master' in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING's third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. NAR JAR pulls himself together again under his mother and friends' help and fights against ZHOU's army for the civilians.
